org.apache.flink.test.util

类 AbstractTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.util.TestLogger
      • org.apache.flink.test.util.TestBaseUtils
        • org.apache.flink.test.util.AbstractTestBase
  • 直接已知子类:
    JavaProgramTestBase, StreamingMultipleProgramsTestBase, StreamingProgramTestBase

    public abstract class AbstractTestBase
extends TestBaseUtils
    A base class for tests that run test programs in a Flink mini cluster.
